 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָחַץ‎</span> **verb** ==squeeze, press==, figurative ==oppress== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 48</sup> (with which [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M74</sup> compare Mandean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הלאצא‎</span>, ***torture***, NS. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***press together, urge, exert oneself)***; see also rare derivatives in Syriac [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>1932</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Judg.4.3|Judg 4:3]] + 2 t. etc.; ***Imperfect*** suffix<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלְחָצֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.56.2|Ps 56:2]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּלְחַץ‎</span> [[Num.22.25|Num 22:25]], etc.; ***Participle*** plural<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹחֲצִים‎</span> [[Exod.3.9|Exod 3:9]] + 2 t., etc. — 

**1.** ***squeeze, press:*** followed by accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> [[Judg.1.34|Judg 1:34]]; [[Num.22.25|Num 22:25]]b ([[BDB#J|J]]); followed by accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> instrumental [[2Kgs.6.32|2Kgs 6:32]] shut the door ***and press him*** (back, out) ***with the door.*** 

**2.** ***oppress:*** followed by accusative of person [[Exod.22.20|Exod 22:20]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ׅ‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(הוֺנָה‎</span>, [[Exod.23.29|Exod 23:29]] (both [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Ps.56.2|Ps 56:2]] of people [[Exod.3.9|Exod 3:9]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; + accusative of congnate meaning with verb), [[Judg.2.18|Judg 2:18]]; [[Judg.4.3|Judg 4:3]]; [[Judg.6.9|Judg 6:9]]; [[Judg.10.12|Judg 10:12]]; [[1Sam.10.18|1Sam 10:18]]; [[Amos.6.14|Amos 6:14]]; [[2Kgs.13.4|2Kgs 13:4]]; [[2Kgs.13.22|2Kgs 13:22]]; [[Jer.30.20|Jer 30:20]]; [[Ps.106.42|Ps 106:42]] absolute [[Isa.19.20|Isa 19:20]] **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּלָּחֵץ‎</span> [[Num.22.25|Num 22:25]]a ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***squeeze oneself***, of Balaam's ass, followed by<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אלהַֿקִּיר‎</span>.
